books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events.
books.name: THE WAGER

books.author: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
books.name: OUTLIVE

books.author: by Hadley Vlahos
books.description: A hospice nurse shares some of her most impactful experiences and questions some of society's beliefs around end-of-life care.
books.name: THE IN-BETWEEN

books.author: by Elliot Page
books.description: The Oscar-nominated star details discovering himself as a trans person and navigating abuse in Hollywood.
books.name: PAGEBOY

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Paul McCartney
books.description: A collection of photographs taken with a 35-millimeter camera during the rise of the Beatles from the end of 1963 through early 1964.

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts and misunderstandings.
books.name: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: by Michelle Zauner
books.description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
books.name: CRYING IN H MART

books.author: by David Von Drehle
books.description: The Washington Post columnist shares stories and wisdom he learned from a neighbor who was more than a century old.
books.name: THE BOOK OF CHARLIE

books.author: by Hannah Pick-Goslar with Dina Kraft
books.description: A memoir by the Holocaust survivor who was first referred to as Lies Goosens in Anne Frank’s diary.
books.name: MY FRIEND ANNE FRANK

books.author: by Jason Chaffetz
books.description: The Fox News contributor and former congressman argues that liberals remain in power no matter who gets elected.
books.name: THE PUPPETEERS

books.author: by Prince Harry
books.description: The Duke of Sussex details his struggles with the royal family, loss of his mother, service in the British Army and marriage to Meghan Markle.
books.name: SPARE

books.author: by Javier Zamora
books.description: The poet describes his journey over two months from El Salvador to the United States to reconnect with his parents who left years earlier.
books.name: SOLITO
